Initial startup Instructions
  1. Turn on the rightmost computer.
  2. Open 1 - Marrow server, wait for message "Consuming speech"
  3. Open 2 - Marrow sound, wait for message "Marrow Sound is now Active"
  4. Open 3 - Marrow table, wait for 5 seconds, table projection goes dark.
  5. Open 4 - Marrow console, wait for message "Connected to Server"
  6. Turn on leftmost computer, wait for wall projection to start.
To start the experience, click on the "START" button.
